channel.title: Guthix sword v2 Released---------------
channel.description:
-----------------released v2-----------
almost works perfect in game and remember this is v1
[img]http://img19.picoodle.com/img/img19/3/2/21/f_LikeaCharmm_4107012.png[/img]
heres the dl
v1: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kzdjtaazmtk]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kzdjtaazmtk[/url]
v2: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?z0yndmjywii
heres the ints [code]if(i == 13211) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12112; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12111; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12111; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Guthix Sword"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Guthix's Mighty Sword".getBytes(); // Item Examine } [/code]
